mean_cn: adj. 陈腐的，平庸的，老一套的
mean_en: not interesting or effective because of being used too often :not fresh or original
word_etyma: trit摩擦+e→像被磨破了一样 → 陈腐的
short_phrase: a trite statue of a cat
sentence: Get that trite little statue out of my house. What a stupid decoration!
sentence_trans: 把那个老套的小雕塑扔出我家！多么无聊的摆设！
